title:
The $\mathfrak{sl}_2$-actions on the symmetric polynomials and on Young
  diagrams
abstract:
In the article, two implementations of the representation of the complex Lie
algebra $\mathfrak{sl}_2$ on the algebra of symmetric polynomials $\Lambda_n$
by differential operators are proposed. The realizations of irreducible
subrepresentations, both finite-dimensional and infinite-dimensional, are
described, and the decomposition of $\Lambda_n$ is found. The actions on the
Schur polynomials is also determined. By using an isomorphism between
$\Lambda_n$ and the vector space of Young diagrams $\mathbb{Q}\mathcal{Y}_n$
with no more than $n$ rows, these representations are transferred to
$\mathbb{Q}\mathcal{Y}_n$.
